Uses of Interface
org.kawanfw.sql.api.server.DatabaseConfigurator

  • Packages that use DatabaseConfigurator 
    Package Description
    org.kawanfw.sql.api.server
    Provides classes and interfaces to configure the Server SQL Manager.
    org.kawanfw.sql.api.server.connectionstore
    Provides classes to manage the JDBC Connections stored in memory on server side (stateful mode only).

    • Uses of DatabaseConfigurator in org.kawanfw.sql.api.server

      Classes in org.kawanfw.sql.api.server that implement DatabaseConfigurator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultDatabaseConfigurator
      Default implementation of server side configuration for AceQL.
      class  SshAuthDatabaseConfigurator
      A concrete DatabaseConfigurator that extends DefaultDatabaseConfigurator and allows zero-code client (username, password) authentication using SSH.

    • Uses of DatabaseConfigurator in org.kawanfw.sql.api.server.connectionstore

      Methods in org.kawanfw.sql.api.server.connectionstore with parameters of type DatabaseConfigurator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ConnectionStoreManager.remove(ConnectionKey connectionKey, DatabaseConfigurator databaseConfigurator)
      Removes from the Connection Store a JDBC Connection identified by a ConnectionKey and release it in the connection pool.

AceQL HTTP - library of REST like APIs that allow to access to remote SQL databases from any device that supports http.
DB2 - Informix - Ingres - MySQL - Oracle Database - PostgreSQL - SQL Server - Sybase - Teradata
